me athara ohu sampadanaya kala warthawak jagath manawa himikam kawunsalaye 26 wani sasiwarayata idiripath kara thibena bawada widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya kiyayi.shri lankawe pawathi yudagatum awasan kirima menma me wanawita kriyathmaka sanwardhana katayuthu sambandhayen rawinatha aariyasinha mahatha mehidi dirgha washayen karunu dakwa thibe.mehidi shri lanka thanapathiwaraya penwa di thibenne shri lanka aanduwa labagath dawantha manushiya jayagrahanaya atham antharjathika prajawe kotas nothaka harima ha awathaksheru kirima kanagatuwata karunak bawayi.ema kriya kalapaya shri lanka aanduwata pamanak nowa deshiya washayen sitina antharjathika sahakaruwanta menma dashaka thunaka kalayak thrasthawadaya hethuwen bata ka pirisata da karana ningawak bawa eksath jathinge sanwidhanaye jiniwa hi shri lanka nithya niyojithawaraya penwa di thibe.aanduwe manushawadi praweshaya pashchath gatum sanwardhana kriyawaliyata pamanak nowa yuda gatum pawathi kalayedi da kriyathmaka kara thibena bawa sihipath kara thibena rawinatha aariyasinha mahatha atham jathyanthara sanwidhana niyojithayan ema kriyadamaya agaya kara thibena bawada sandahan kara atha.yunisef aayathanaye hitapu widhayaka adhyakshaka jems grant mahatha penwa di thibenne yuddhaya pawathi kalaye di shri lankawe manushiya kriyadamaya adwithiya ekak bawayi.me athara shri lanka thanapathiwaraya penwa di thibenne abhyanthara washayen awathanwuwan nawatha padinchi kirime kriyawaliya sarthakawa kriyathmaka kirimata shri lanka aanduwa kapawi sitina bawath ehidi antharjathika prajawage andahas walata anuwa katayuthu karana bawathya..
